name: Retro Road Rumble
overview: Retro Road Rumble is an arcade-style game that offers the same experience that can be found in the classic tabletop arcade machines. Two challengers race head-to-head by taking either side of the Wii U™ GamePad to control their cars. Or, one player can race against the clock and strive to get the high score. With 8 fast-paced levels, each with unique events and environs, along with a day/night setting, no two matches will ever be the same. Retro Road Rumble truly gives players the chance to have the type of one of a kind experience that only the Wii U can offer!
